description.narrative: This project was designed to modernize the Port of Cotonou by improving management performance, physical security, and cargo capacity, thereby reducing transportation costs to consumers. Customs reforms and IT investments complemented physical and management improvements. By 2013, a private concessionaire is expected to invest over $130 million in a new cargo terminal.

title.narrative: Measuring Results of the Benin Access to Markets

condition.narrative: Commitment shall be made by the Government to fund, or commitments shall be made by another funding source satisfactory to MCC for amounts in excess of budgeted amount in the financial plan including amounts that may be necessary for environmental mitigation and remediation. Commitment(s) shall remain in effect through the life of the Compact

For all concessions within the Port right-of-way, the PAC has been designated the grantor and the beneficiary of the income resulting from the concession or lease.Evidence: Assignment of rights and responsibilities of concession agreements from the current grantor to the PAC, and any other concession or lease on PAC premises shall be between PAC and the concessionaire/lessee.
M&E Outcome indicator ??Bulk ship carrier wait time (days)?? at port?? achieves its Year 3 target of 6 days

The Government complies with agreement not to institute a container scanning system at the Port unless and until (1) a study of the effectiveness of such a scanning system has been completed pursuant to Section 2(a)(ii) of Schedule 4 to Annex I of the Compact or (2) MCC has determined in its sole discretion that the proposed scanning system will not be detrimental to the effectiveness of MCC?s investments and activities at the Port.

The Government has not instituted or continued a tax, levy, duty, or other charge or any delivery procedure or requirement at the Port or elsewhere which may affect the competitiveness of the Port without the prior consent of MCC

The Government shall ensure that the PAC provides appropriate resources to the PAC Environmental Manager as identified by the PAC and as recommended by MCA-Benin port advisor consultant and the ESA Director
